attributes.title: How to run copy experiments & why you should differentiate, with Peep Laja
attributes.summary:
In this episode we learn about the impact of copy on conversion and what things to take into account when running copy experiments.

Shownotes: https://www.cro.cafe/podcast/how-to-run-copy-experiments-and-why-you-should-differentiate
